==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=半斤八两}}

===Etymology===
Literally: Half a [[w:catty|catty]] vs. eight [[w:tael|taels]]. Formerly, one [[w:catty|catty]] was equal to 16 [[w:tael|taels]].
